option.name: originalContent
option.value:
name: Playwright tests and publish report
on: push: branches: [ main, master, feature/** ] pull_request:
permissions: contents: write pages: write
jobs: test-and-deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Provide Sauce credentials from repository Secrets so tests can run in CI env: SAUCE_USER: ${{ secrets.SAUCE_USER }} SAUCE_SENHA: ${{ secrets.SAUCE_SENHA }} steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 with: persist-credentials: true fetch-depth: 0
- name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: '18'
- name: Install dependencies run: npm ci --no-audit --no-fund || npm install --no-audit --no-fund
- name: Install Playwright browsers run: npx playwright install --with-deps
- name: Check credentials presence (masked) run: | echo "Has SAUCE_USER? $( [ -n \"$SAUCE_USER\" ] && echo yes || echo no )" echo "Has SAUCE_SENHA? $( [ -n \"$SAUCE_SENHA\" ] && echo yes || echo no )"
- name: Run Playwright tests (produce Allure results) run: npx playwright test
- name: Generate Allure HTML report run: npx allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report
- name: Publish Allure HTML report to gh-pages uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: # Use a repo-level PAT if provided as secret GH_PAGES_TOKEN, otherwise fall back to the default GITHUB_TOKEN github_token: ${{ secrets.GH_PAGES_TOKEN || secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./allure-report publish_branch: gh-pages # Optionally set a custom commit message commit_message: "Deploy Allure report: ${{ github.sha }}"

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
name: Playwright tests and publish report
on: push: branches: [ main, master, feature/** ] pull_request:
permissions: contents: write pages: write
jobs: test-and-deploy: runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Provide Sauce credentials from repository Secrets so tests can run in CI env: SAUCE_USER: ${{ secrets.SAUCE_USER }} SAUCE_SENHA: ${{ secrets.SAUCE_SENHA }} steps: - name: Checkout repository uses: actions/checkout@v4 with: persist-credentials: true fetch-depth: 0
- name: Setup Node.js uses: actions/setup-node@v4 with: node-version: '18'
- name: Install dependencies run: npm ci --no-audit --no-fund || npm install --no-audit --no-fund
- name: Install Playwright browsers run: npx playwright install --with-deps
- name: Check credentials presence (masked) run: | echo "Has SAUCE_USER? $( [ -n \"$SAUCE_USER\" ] && echo yes || echo no )" echo "Has SAUCE_SENHA? $( [ -n \"$SAUCE_SENHA\" ] && echo yes || echo no )"
- name: Run Playwright tests (produce Allure results) run: npx playwright test
- name: Generate Allure HTML report run: | # Remove old report if exists to ensure clean generation rm -rf allure-report # Generate report without --clean to preserve all data files npx allure generate allure-results -o allure-report # Verify report was generated ls -la allure-report/data
- name: Publish Allure HTML report to gh-pages uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: # Use a repo-level PAT if provided as secret GH_PAGES_TOKEN, otherwise fall back to the default GITHUB_TOKEN github_token: ${{ secrets.GH_PAGES_TOKEN || secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./allure-report publish_branch: gh-pages # Optionally set a custom commit message commit_message: "Deploy Allure report: ${{ github.sha }}"
